name: indie-web-for-all
description: A service providing an IndieWeb profile for users without the technical knowledge to maintain their own site.

scripts.start:dev: npm run build:client:dev && npm run build:server:dev && NODE_ENV=development node app/server/index.js
scripts.start:prod: npm run build:client:prod && npm run build:server:prod && NODE_ENV=production node app/server/index.js
scripts.build:server:dev: mkdir -p app/server && browserify src/server-entry.js -t handlebarsify -t babelify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] -t vueify --node --no-bundle-external --debug > app/server/index.js
scripts.build:server:prod: mkdir -p app/server && browserify src/server-entry.js -t handlebarsify -t babelify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -t vueify --node --no-bundle-external > app/server/index.js
scripts.build:client:dev: mkdir -p app/client && browserify src/client-entry.js -t babelify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] -t vueify --debug > app/client/index.js
scripts.build:client:prod: mkdir -p app/client && browserify src/client-entry.js -t babelify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -t vueify > app/client/index.js

author: Evan Minto (vamptvo@gmail.com)
